trans-unit.source: Retrieves the mapping of an interface into the actual methods on a class that implements that interface.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o mapeamento de uma interface para os reais métodos em uma classe que implementa essa interface.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping> structure when a type implements interface methods that use method names other than those specified by the interface, or when a type implements multiple interfaces which have a method with the same name.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping> estrutura quando um tipo implementa os métodos de interface que usam nomes de método além daqueles especificados pela interface, ou quando um tipo implementa várias interfaces que têm um método com o mesmo nome.

trans-unit.source: To obtain an <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping> structure, use the <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping> estrutura, use o <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Shows the methods that are defined on the interface.
trans-unit.target: Mostra os métodos que são definidos na interface.

trans-unit.source: The elements returned in the `InterfaceMethods` array match their counterpart elements returned from the <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.TargetMethods> array.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos retornados no `InterfaceMethods` matriz corresponder seus elementos de contraparte retornados do <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.TargetMethods> matriz.

trans-unit.source: That is, the elements are in the same array indexing order.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, os elementos são na mesma matriz de indexação de ordem.

trans-unit.source: Shows the type that represents the interface.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o tipo que representa a interface.

trans-unit.source: Shows the methods that implement the interface.
trans-unit.target: Mostra os métodos que implementam a interface.

trans-unit.source: The elements returned in the <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.InterfaceMethods> array match their counterpart elements returned from the `TargetMethods` array.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos retornados no <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.InterfaceMethods> matriz corresponder seus elementos de contraparte retornados do `TargetMethods` matriz.

trans-unit.source: That is, the elements are in the same array indexing order.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, os elementos são na mesma matriz de indexação de ordem.

trans-unit.source: Represents the type that was used to create the interface mapping.
trans-unit.target: Representa o tipo que foi usado para criar o mapeamento de interface.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.TargetType> field is the instance of <xref:System.Type> whose <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A> method returned the current <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping> structure.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.TargetType> campo é a instância do <xref:System.Type> cujo <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A> método retornou atual <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping> estrutura.
